name: List of tested Identity Providers

body:

On the following page you can find a list of Identity Providers which are already tested to work with Okta.

Azure AD B2C

https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/services/active-directory-b2c/

Not to confuse with Azure AD. Azure AD B2C is one service offered by the Azure cloud.
